mainText:
Dear Apple,

I remember the first time my dad bought me an Apple Ipod.  I think it was the 2nd generation with the click wheel and the four buttons on top.  i was really amazed and thought whoever invented such.  I admire the man who provided the world with so much ease and comfort with technology.  I never thought that being a "techie" would be so cool.  Steve Jobs made the world love technology and learn from it even more.

We will forever be grateful for sharing his inventions.  I know it's impossible but I hope that there will be another Steve Jobs to further more impossible inventions.

Thanks Steve.
author: Ching
